alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 9:29PM MDT until June 21 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 929 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fountain, or 11 miles southeast of Colorado Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fountain, Hanover and Security-Widefield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
